title: Lost passwords and bookmarks
content: I was having problems with Windows 11 and I reinstalled it, After the new installation I lost my passwords and bookmarks from Firefox. I signed into Firefox however I did not know my password so I had to renew it, does this mean I have lost the passwords and bookmarks forever? I didn't have a recent back up, either. I tried to do a system restore but the new version of Windows 11 did not have any restore points. Regards from Narelle Patterson
creator: nepatterson58

title: Access Denied
content: I am getting "Access Denied" responses this morning. Have tried "forget about this site" but i does not help. Still cannot get onto websites.
creator: diamond.lee2020

title: Sync local profile with Firefox account
content: I have a local Firefox profile that's contains all my saved passwords bookmarks and history. Therefore all my firefox data are saved on my local harddrive and they can't be sync across different devices unless I manually export/import them. If i create a new Firefox account, is it possible that I can import all my existing local passwords, bookmarks, history, etc onto my newly create Firefox account so they can be sync across different devices. If so, how?
creator: danial_za

title: Firefox show porn website after each time turn on computer. Help!
content:
Refer above subject. This is my office laptop- only for email purpose and use to gather information online

I've installed u-block but the problem still exist. How to re-format firefox and start as new.

Thank you in advanced
creator: samwong

title: MacOS plugin container trying to connect to blacklisted/proxy IP address
content:
Hi Running FF 99.0.1 on MacOS Big Sur (11.6.4) and my Lulu outbound network monitoring app (https://objective-see.com/products/lulu.html) is flagging an attempt by the FF MacOS plugin container trying to access a high risk site (93/100) according to https://www.ipqualityscore.com/free-ip-lookup-proxy-vpn-test/lookup/104.16.248.249.

=======The lulu popup notification shows: Message : plugin-container.app is trying to connect to 104.16.248.249 Process ID: 44441 Process args: -parentBuildID 20220411174855 -prefsLen 6210 -prefMapSize 255244 -sbStartup -sbAppPath /Applications/Firefox.app -appDir /Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/Resources/browser -profile /Users/xxxxx/Library/Application Support/Firefox/Profiles/dps0ori7.default-release 44428 gecko-crash-server-pipe.44428 org.mozilla.machname.1552309677 socket Process Path: /Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/MacOS/plugin-container.app

IP address: 104.16.248.249 port & protocol: 443 (TCP) reverse DNS name: unknown

==

https://www.abuseipdb.com/whois/104.16.248.249 shows a hostname of aofeisheng.com.

Cannot really tell if this is a false positive or something I should block permanently. Not sure why my plugin container is reaching out when the browser was just updated.

Thanks
creator: 06hawser-cooking

title: Crash when loading some tabs on VNC server host
content:
Since the Firefox 99 update loading some pages (for example, the Gmail sign-in page) using Firefox on my Linux Mint machine, that I'm running a VNC remote desktop session on, results in a crash.

Crash report ID: bp-5dc1e89d-dc1f-40f2-9dbe-7f4380220419

I've tried running Firefox in safe-mode and the crash doesn't happen, but turning off hardware acceleration, swapping to default themes, removing all extensions, and completely removing Firefox and the .mozilla folder and then re-installing Firefox have not changed the crash behaviour in the absence of the safe-mode flag.

I would appreciate help in identifying what other paths of investigation I can take.
creator: avmurray2

title: Can't Open Firefox Due to Error Msg
content:
Hello. Have only 1 version open, yet get error msg can't open more than 1.

Macbook Pro Monterrey 12.3.1 updated today. When restarted after update, got notice that I now had newest version of Firefox.

Have gone through Apps folder, Trash, searched Finder, task bar, every place. Deleted Firefox and downloaded again. Still get that error msg, even though there is only 1 on my machine.

Desperate, have to file taxes tonight. Don't want to resort to Chrome and have my privacy violated.

Please help.

Thanks so much,

Lynne
creator: lrmmmn

title: Mac message "Can't open Firefox. Only one Firefox can be open at a time."
content: We had problems completing IRS fillable forms on our Mac. After processing a major update on the Mac, we tried to open Firefox, but instead got the message "A copy of Firefox is already open. Only one Firefox can be open at time." The Firefox we are trying to open is the only one there.
creator: rabenson72

title: Herramienta: Firefox Monitor
content:
Buen día a quien corresponda, hace un tiempo, casi un mes después de haber iniciado, use Firefox Monitor, y me ha servido bien enviando las notificaciones sobre alguna brecha, puse además 13 direcciones a que las mismas sean monitorizadas, ahora bien, hoy por la tarde, cree un nuevo e-mail por motivos personales y me acordé de esta grandiosa herramienta, inicié sesión y cuando me dispuse a agregar la nueva cuenta justo como se hacía tiempo atrás, no pude, busque y busque y nada, incluso pregunté vía Twitter pero no me dieron respuesta, a esta grandiosa comunidad pregunto: ¿Acaso ya no se pueden agregar más cuentas a Firefox Monitor? Es poco creíble puesto que su publicidad sigue diciendo: Monitoriza varias direcciones de correo. Monitorizar filtraciones para varias direcciones de correo.

¿Alguien sabe cómo agregar más cuentas de correo a dicha herramienta? Gracias de antemano.
creator: AlbertoS7
